Body: In English in sentences like it is soon or he is fine what is the part of speech of the last word?
Title: Is "soon" in "it is soon" a predicative adverb or adjective or both?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: I'm a PhD student in Linguistics at University College London. My primary area of interest is generative linguistics, and specifically syntactic and semantic theory. More narrowly still, i'm interested in ellipsis, comparatives, and binding theory. Follow me on twitter!
